comments.author: Odusko
comments.body: Welcome to bitcointalk, am glad to see that you made an official discussion thread and also seeking for members review. I commend you on that move, but I will advise you to pay close attention to suggestions as they keep coming in any moment from now when players will begin to visit your casino, the more you have the intention of running a signature campaign that way you can increase your visibility in the forum. @minime0105 I believe that we will have to give room for growth and discovery, I know how trustless we are in this place but then we should also make sure we support every new project because we can't tell. Which one will become legit in the future, so our involvement matters.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: The name and branding looks very much professional. I mean really impressed with the name of the casino. Moreover I see that you have already many good features added in the site. So currently only BTC accepted for the deposits? It will be great if you can add ETH next as the coin to play at site. After BTC many people like to play with ETH, for that reason this will be beneficial. Moreover do you have any restrictions for specific countries? Or player from all around the globe are allowed? Moreover what’s the max amount a user can win in a single bet? Waiting for the answers.

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptolottery.BET on January 01, 2023, 07:00:00 PMNice and short explanation video. Welcome to the forum.This will be a challenging project. We all are used to see regular gambling sites but this one seems totally different. Anything new most of the time takes longer time to establish. But with a good management and patience a new concept becomes the pioneer of it's niche. Good luck.If you have Bitcointalk promotion in mind, then feel free to contact me. I can assist you to promote it in the community.Cheers,

comments.author: Bitinity
comments.body: Quote from: Royse777 on January 02, 2023, 02:28:15 AMThis will be a challenging project. We all are used to see regular gambling sites but this one seems totally different. Anything new most of the time takes longer time to establish. I would say the opposite, it is not totally different but it is completely the same as other hundreds sites out there because the script/software can be bought easily through codecanyon. The main script itself is worth no more than $200, and the add on game for lottery costs him $30. For all games, someone need to spend around $800 only to own a gambling site like cryptolottery bet. For your references: https://codecanyon.net/item/crypto-casino-slot-machine-online-gambling-platform-laravel-5-application/23088602

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Quote from: Nrcewker on January 02, 2023, 02:03:56 AMMoreover do you have any restrictions for specific countries? Or player from all around the globe are allowed? Moreover what’s the max amount a user can win in a single bet? Waiting for the answers. These are all valid questions and concerns, and it should be clear by reading the terms and conditions of the site. Unfortunately, none of these things are mentioned in the sites' T&C. It's actually one of the shortest documents I have ever seen in a crypto casino. I can only imagine that there are no country and territory restrictions since this is not a licensed casino and supports only cryptocurrencies and no fiat. @Cryptolottery.BET You should definitely work on creating a proper T&C agreement that covers everything about your offer and services in the same way that other casinos have done it.Quote from: joebic541 on January 02, 2023, 12:26:26 PMDo you have any bounty or airdrop? It's not an ICO, it's a casino. What do you expect them to airdrop to you, bitcoin?They have a faucet you can claim once a day. Read the help page for more information.

comments.author: hd49728
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptolottery.BET on January 02, 2023, 01:20:00 AMCorrect, the old thread has been locked in order to start a new non self-moderated thread following the advice of the community.Maybe you did not know.You don't have to create a new thread to remove a self-moderation of your old thread. You can keep the old thread but moving it to Meta. In Meta board, threads are not allowed to be self-moderated and your thread will no longer be self-moderated after moving.After that, you can move it back to Gambling board and it will still be not self-moderated.
